=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:50:01
Folder: CFUBM14 - thank you for 2024
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CFUBM14_00
From: Patrick Chalhoub <Patrick.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-18 16:34
Subject: Thank you for 2024
--------------------------------------------------
	
	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=c1da3a1291&e=0385dbee45> 	
	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=90c95e07b4&e=0385dbee45> 	
	

Dear Colleagues,  

We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude to all of you for another relatively good year. 

We anticipate our Group closing the year with a growth of +5.5%. Despite global challenges in the luxury market, where sales are expected to remain stagnant in 2024, and the war in Palestine and Lebanon, which has impacted many of our colleagues and the confidence of our customers, we have achieved notable success... Read more <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=600d8a979c&e=0385dbee45> 

الزملاء الأعزاء،

We anticipate our Group closing the year with a growth of +5.5%. Despite global challenges in the luxury market, where sales are expected to remain stagnant in 2024, and the war in Palestine and Lebanon, which has impacted many of our colleagues and the confidence of our customers, we have achieved notable success... Read more <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=600d8a979c&e=0385dbee45> 

الزملاء الأعزاء،


مع اقتراب نهاية عام 2024، نعرب عن امتناننا العميق لكم جميعاً على الأداء الجيد نسبياً للمجموعة هذه السنة، إذ نتوقع إغلاق العام بنسبة نمو تزيد عن 5.5 بالمئة. فعلى الرغم من التحديات العالمية التي واجهها سوق السلع الفاخرة وتوقعات الركود في المبيعات خلال عام 2024، وعلى الرغم من الأثر العميق الذي تركته الحرب في فلسطين ولبنان على العديد من زملائنا وعلى ثقة عملائنا أيضاً، تمكنت المجموعة من تحقيق نجاح ملحوظ ...للمزيد <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=717619cd36&e=0385dbee45> 

Watch the full video here! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=f0054f42b7&e=0385dbee45>
